data.title: Science And Technology Awards : Physics
data.meta_description: General Knowledge Lists: The list of Science And Technology Awards
data.text:
Following is the list of Science And Technology Awards:

S.No. Awards & Honours

Purpose/Objective

First Held in country/year

Name of Body/Institution/ Government

1

Comstock Prize in Physics (awarded every 5 years)

Awarded for recent innovative discovery or investigation in electricity, magnetism, or radiant energy, broadly interpreted." 1913 U.S. National Academy of Sciences 2

Dannie Heineman Prize for Astrophysics

Awarded for outstanding work in astrophysics 1980 American Astronomical Society and American Institute of Physics 3

Dannie Heineman Prize for Mathematical Physics

Awarded for Mathematical Physics

1959 American Physical Society and American Institute of Physics 4

Infosys Prize

Awarded for Outstanding contributions in five categories:

1)Physical Science - Physics, Chemistry and Earth Science

2)Mathematical Science - Mathematics and Statistics

3)Engineering and Computer Science – All branches of Engineering

4)Life Science – Biology, Biotechnology, Medicine and Agriculture

5)Social Science – Economics, History, Sociology, Anthropology and Political Science 2008 Presented by Infosys Science Foundation 5

J. Tuzo Wilson Medal

Awarded to recognize scientists who have made an outstanding contribution to the field of geophysics in Canada 1978 Canadian Geophysical Union 6

Lorentz Medal

Awarded to dedicated to the advancement of science and literature 1925 Royal Netherlands Academy of Arts and Sciences 7

Matteucci Medal

Awarded to physicists for their fundamental contributions 1868 --- 8 Max Planck medal Awarded for extraordinary achievements in theoretical physics 1929 Deutsche Physikalische Gesellschaft (German Physics Society)

9

Nobel Prize in Physics

Awarded for Outstanding contributions in Physics 1901 Presented by Royal Swedish Academy of Sciences 10

Sakurai Prize

Honors outstanding achievement in particle physics theory. 1985 American Physical Society 11

Wolf Prize in Physics

Honors outstanding achievement in physics. 1978 Wolf Foundation in Israel 12

Hughes Medal

Awarded in recognition of an original discovery in the physical sciences, particularly electricity and magnetism or their applications 1902 Royal Society of London 13

Henry Draper Medal

Awarded for investigations in astronomical physics 1886 United States National Academy of Sciences
